verbose_text: Strategies validated in GB xenograft models include the combination of individual CAR-T cells targeting ErbB2 or IL-13Ralpha2, or co-expression of ErbB2- and IL-13Ralpha2-specific CARs, or receptors targeting ErbB2, IL-13Ralpha2 and EphA2 in the same T cells.
evidence: co-expression of ErbB2- and IL-13Ralpha2-specific CARs
